page.title: 04THE TWO CHURCHES.
page.content: In our area there are two churches, {St.Mary's in Craswall,and St.Michael's in Michaelchurch. {Craswall Church}is tiny.Outside there is a{preaching cross}which was used before the church was built.On the north wall of the church there is a red line which was used for a game called{5 Court}an old popular game in Herefordshire.Inside there is an unusual choir loft,like a minstrels gallery. {Michaelchurch Church}is much bigger. It has a bell towewr and 5 bells which are not rung now as the structure is dangerous.It has a famous{old plaster} {painting}on one wall showing Christ surrounded by tools used in the old rural communities. The churches are quite well attended in this area.
